document.full_text: the relationship between coach jim calhoun and the family of the huskies' star freshman jeremy lamb goes back 27 years, and it wasn't always very happy for calhoun.
document.title: freshman eases the pain his father caused calhoun
lines_and_colors: the relationship between coach jim calhoun and the family of the huskies' star freshman jeremy lamb goes back 27 years, and it wasn't always very happy for calhoun.
